tuv.seg: Membership of Dáil Eireann, including the weekly schedule of business
Deantar cuir síos anseo ar cheann de thithe an Oireachtais, sé sin, Dáil Éireann
This document describes the role and responsibilities of the Ceann Comhairle, who is the chairperson of Dáil Eireann
Déantar cur síos anseo ar ról an Cheann Chomhairle atá ina Chathaoirleach ar Dháil Éireann
This document describes the privileges of members of Dáil Eireann and Seanad Eireann - the two houses of the Oireachtas(the Irish parliament)
Déantar cuir síos anseo ar na pribhléidí atá ag Teachtaí Dála agus ag Seanadóirí in Éirinn
Question time in Dáil Éireann
Tráth na gceisteanna i nDáil Éireann
Members of parliament (TDs) can put oral and written questions to the Taoiseach and government ministers
Déantar cuir síos anseo ar conas is féidir le Teachtaí Dála ceisteanna a chuir ar an Taoiseach agus ar na hAirí Rialtais
Work of a TD
Obair na dTeachtaí Dála
The work of a TD (Teachta Dála) is varied and involves attending meetings, researching and examining proposed legislation and participating in Government committees
Tá obair Teachta Dála ilchineálach lena náirítear freastal ag cruinnithe, taighde agus scrúdú reachtaíocht beartaithe agus glacadh páirt i gCoistí Rialtais
Eligibility for Membership of Dáil Eireann
Intofacht mar theachta i nDáil Éireann
This document describes the eligibility criteria in order to qualify for membership of Dáil Eireann (house of the Irish parliament)
Tá cur síos anseo ar intofacht mar theachta i nDáil Éireann
Registering a political party in Ireland
Páirtí polaitiúil a chlárú in Eirinn
How to register a political party in Ireland
Cén chaoi a gcláraítear páirtí polaitiúil in Éirinn
This document describes the circumstances in which Dáil Éireann (lower house of the Irish parliament) can be dissolved
Tugann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar na cúinsí inar féidir Dáil Éireann a lánscor
This document describes how laws are made by the Oireachtas (the Irish parliament)
Déantar cuir síos anseo ar conas a dhéanann an tOireachtas dlíthe
Private Members' Bills are proposals for legislation initiated by members of the Dáil or Seanad
Is Billí na mBall Príobháideach iad bearta reachtúla atá tosnaithe ag Baill den Dáil nó den Seanad
This document describes the Seanad or Irish senate and the eligibility criteria for becoming a Senator
Tá cur síos anseo ar Sheanad Éireann agus na daoine atá intofa le seasamh mar iarrthóirí don Seanad
The main function of Seanad Eireann is in relation to legislation
Baineann príomhfheidhm Sheanad Éireann le reachtaíocht
What role does the Seanad have and what are its powers?
Cad é ról an tSeanaid agus cad iad a gcumhachtaí?
Cathaoirleach of Seanad Éireann
Cathaoirleach ar Seanad Éireann
The Cathaoirleach (or chairperson) of the Seanad has a number of powers and responsibilities
Tá cur síos anseo ar ról an Cathaoirligh sa Seanad
Nomination of Seanad panel candidates
Iarrthóirí Painéal an tSeanaid a Ainmniú
How candidates for the five panels that are formed in the Seanad in advance of general elections in Ireland are nominated
Tá cur síos anseo ar an gcóras atá ann iarrthóirí a ainmniú don chúig painéal a chrúthaítear sa Seanad roimh ollthoghcháin
Most Read in "Government in Ireland"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Office of the Ombudsman
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
